1428380.name: Child Arms Demo
1428380.description:
This demo contains the following features:

- Two characters to play as.
- Arcade mode against both CPU controller opponents.
- Five difficulty settings.
- Local Versus mode with options to change rounds, timer, and number of bars.
- Color editor.
- Training options including practice, tutorials, and character information.

Note: This game saves files on your system. This includes a save file and color editor data. if you plan to remove this game from your system, go to the options menu under Data to delete all these files, otherwise they will remain in your system even if you uninstall the game.
